feed.title: Track Awesome Broadcasting Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of amazingly awesome open source resources related to broadcast technologies

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 25, 2025
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • SPX - Graphics Controller (⭐363) - Graphics control client for live video productions and live streams.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 14, 2025
entry.content:
Clocks & Studio Screens

  • PiClock Advanced (⭐7) - Improved version of PiRSClock-Full with changed layout, added timers and network capabilities.

Rundown automation

  • OnTime (⭐635) - Web based time keeping system for live events with a broadcast clock view.
  • SuperConductor (⭐285) - Rundown/playout controller for CasparCG Server, BMD ATEM, OBS Studio, vMix, OSC-compatible devices, HTTP (REST)-compatible devices among others.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 03, 2025
entry.content:
Video Production

  • vMix-EmberPlus (⭐4) - vMix to EmberPlus gateway. Control vMix from any EmberPlus broadcast controller like Lawo's VSM or EVS's Cerebrum.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Dec 02, 2024
entry.content:
Podcasting

  • Ultraschall - Suite of Plugins and UI tweaks to use with the DAW Reaper tailored towards Podcasters (ultraschall.fm)

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Sep 21, 2024
entry.content:
Podcasting

  • AntennaPod (⭐7.1k) - A podcast manager for Android (antennapod.org).
  • Anytime Podcast Player (⭐520) - Free and easy to use podcast player for Android and iOS (anytimeplayer.app).
  • Castopod (⭐732) - Podcast Hosting and Broadcasting (castopod.org).
  • gPodder (⭐1.4k) - Media aggregator and podcast client (gpodder.org).
  • Podlove Publisher (⭐302) - Podcast Publisher for WordPress (podlove.org).
  • Podlove Web Player (⭐88) - Podcast-optimized, HTML5-based video and audio player (podlove.org).

Streaming

  • PeerTube (⭐14k) - ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser. (https://joinpeertube.org/)

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Sep 19, 2024
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Bridge (⭐52) - Next generation graphics control software, with extension support.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Sep 03, 2024
entry.content:
Network & Storage Testing

  • Examples of SMPTE ST 2110 pcap files (⭐24)

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 31, 2024
entry.content:
Metadata

  • SDPoker (⭐14) - CLI tool and library for testing SMPTE ST2110 SDP files.

NMOS

  • NVIDIA NMOS Library (⭐15) (NvNmos) - A simple-to-use C/C++ library for adding an NMOS Node to your application, with support for IS-04, IS-05, BCP-002-01, BCP-002-02, BCP-004-01, etc.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 20, 2024
entry.content:
Communication

  • Intercom Manager (⭐21) + Intercom Frontend (⭐12) - Intercom system based on built by Eyevinn for SVT.
  • DYI intercom (⭐63) - Hardware + software intercom solution built around Murmur server and headless Mumble clients based on Rasperry Pi.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 05, 2024
entry.content:
Media Players

  • Media4DPlayer - HTML5 player focused on accessibility.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Dec 21, 2023
entry.content:
NMOS

  • DELTACAST IP Virtual Card NMOS samples (⭐6) - A demonstration of the integration of several NMOS standards with the DELTACAST IP Virtual Card through nmos-cpp (⭐165).

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 25, 2023
entry.content:
Network & Storage Testing

  • Wireshark dissector for TSL UMD protocol V3.1, V4 (⭐6) - Analyzers for TSL UMD (under-monitor display) protocol V3.1 and V4.
  • Wireshark dissectors for Video Routers (⭐14) - Analyzers for various video router/matrix protocols.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 20, 2023
entry.content:
Clocks & Studio Screens

  • PiRSClock-Full (⭐23) - Radio Studio Clock with studio indicators for mics, telephones etc.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 26, 2023
entry.content:
Control Systems

  • BUG - Broadcast Universal Gateway - Control a wide range of broadcast and network equipment from your browser.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Oct 22, 2022
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Studio TV Player (⭐53) - Simple TV studio player with SDI, NDI and MPEG TS outputs.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Sep 07, 2022
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • ffplayout (⭐524) - Rust and FFmpeg based playout from folder or playlists.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 19, 2022
entry.content:
Video Production

  • AutoMix (⭐6) - Web-based control surface for ATEM vision mixers with automated camera switching, designed for visualised radio.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 31, 2022
entry.content:
Blogs

  • IRT Lab - IRT blog posting developments and demos for all digital audiovisual media technology.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jan 06, 2022
entry.content:
Video Production

  • QPrompt Teleprompter App - Convergent teleprompter software that works with studio teleprompters, tablet teleprompters, webcams, and phones.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Nov 30, 2021
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • SVT Encore (⭐294) - Selfhosted video transcoding plattform, built around FFmpeg.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 21, 2021
entry.content:
Control Systems

  • Lawo EmberPlus (⭐121) - Ember Plus - open protocol for interfacing to / from broadcast control systems.
  • MIDIMonster (⭐549) - Lightweight adapter tool for common show control protocols.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 12, 2021
entry.content:
NMOS

  • NVIDIA NMOS Docker - Docker container with Registry and Controller, IS-04/05/08/07/09, BCP-003-01

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jul 30, 2021
entry.content:
Video Production

  • TallyArbiter - Cross-platform Tally interfacer & tally lights for any camera via phones or low-cost hardware.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 26, 2021
entry.content:
Monitoring & Quality Control

  • MXF Inspect (⭐47) - A Windows tool to display the internal structure of an MXF (Material eXchange Format) file.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 26, 2021
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • NodeCG - Broadcast graphics rendered in a browser using Node.js.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 23, 2021
entry.content:
NMOS

  • AMWA NMOS Testing Tool - Automated test suites for the AMWA NMOS family of specifications, as used in the JT-NM Tested programme

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Dec 20, 2020
entry.content:
Streaming

  • Owncast (⭐10k) - Selfhosted video streaming plattform (https://owncast.online/)

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Oct 18, 2020
entry.content:
NMOS

  • BBC NMOS Joint Reference Implementation (⭐13) - A Vagrant provisioning to build 4 virtual machines, an IS-04/IS-05 Node, IS-04 Registry, BCP-003-02 Authorisation Server, and the NMOS Testing Tool.
  • Easy-NMOS (⭐75) - A starter kit that allows the user to launch a simple NMOS setup with minimal installation steps, composed of three Docker containers: an NMOS Registry, a virtual NMOS Node, and the AMWA NMOS Testing Tool.
  • nmos-cpp (⭐165) - An implementation of the AMWA Networked Media Open Specifications in C++, including an NMOS Registry and a toolkit and example of building an NMOS Node.
  • nmos-js (⭐37) - A simple browser-based NMOS Client/Controller with an IS-04 Registry browser and IS-05 Connection Management.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Sep 13, 2020
entry.content:
Clocks & Studio Screens

  • OnAirScreen (⭐102) - Cross-platform "OnAir Lamp" solution targeted for use in professional broadcast environments.
  • PiClock (⭐30) - Customisable network based displays of clocks, on-air, mic live and other studio indicators.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 27, 2020
entry.content:
Codecs

  • Lame - A high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder.
  • Opus - A totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.
  • TwoLame - An MPEG Audio Layer 2 (MP2) encoder.

Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Macadam (⭐114) - Blackmagic Node.js bindings that support HTML/CSS (via Electron) and SVG (via Sevruga (⭐5)) graphics.

Radio Production

  • LibreTime - Radio broadcast & automation platform (fork of Airtime).

Software-defined radio

  • Gqrx SDR - An open source software defined radio receiver (SDR).

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 15, 2020
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • Brave (⭐673) - Basic Real-time AV Editor - lets you preview, mix, and route live audio and video streams on the cloud.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 30, 2019
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Nebula - Media asset management and broadcast automation system.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 13, 2019
entry.content:
Metadata

  • libklvanc (⭐64) - C library for ancillary data extraction from SDI and SMPTE ST 2110-40 (CEA-708, AFD, SCTE-104, etc.).

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 09, 2019
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • libear (⭐32) - A C++11 library to render ADM content according to Recommendation ITU-R BS.2127.

Radio Production

  • Rivendell (⭐220) - Complete radio broadcast automation solution, translated to many languages and used worldwide.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jul 07, 2019
entry.content:
Connected TVs

  • Cross-Platform Authentication - CPA offers an open standard for associating any media device with an online identity.

Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • ossia - A free and open-source intermedia sequencer.

Hybrid Radio

  • RadioDNS Manager (⭐15) - Platform to manage Hybrid Radio services, e.g. RadioVIS, RadioEPG and Service Following.

Media Players

  • GPAC - Multimedia player, packager and tools.
  • Peaks.js - Browser-based audio waveform visualisation.

Metadata

  • BMXlib - Library and utilities to read and write broadcasting media files. Primarily supports the MXF file format.
  • jebu-core (⭐2) - Java port of EBU Tech 3293 EBU Core metadata, including the Audio Definition Model.

Monitoring & Quality Control

  • Jmeters - A collection of graphical audio meters for JACK, including VU, PPM and EBU R 128 Loudness meters.
  • MediaConch - Implementation checker, policy checker, & reporter for Matroska, FFV1, & PCM.
  • Sonic Visualiser - An application for viewing and analysing the contents of music audio files.

Multimedia content processing

  • Libebur128 (⭐442) - A library that implements the EBU R 128 standard for loudness normalisation.
  • MXFLib - A multi-platform C++ library for reading and writing MXF files.
  • OBS-Studio (⭐65k) - Software for live streaming and screen recording.
  • TuttleOFX (⭐183) - An open source image processing framework based on OpenFX plugin standard.

Network & Storage Testing

  • BBC Media Storage Meter - An application for the testing of network attached (professional media) storage.

Radio Production

  • Airtime (⭐623) - Radio management application for remote broadcast automation (via web-based schedule).
  • Audacity - Cross-platform software for recording and editing sounds.
  • AzuraCast (⭐3.4k) - A self-hosted web radio management suite.
  • Liquidsoap (⭐1.5k) - A Swiss army knife for multimedia streaming (documentation).

Software-defined radio

  • rtl-sdr - Turns a Realtek RTL2832 based DVB dongle into a SDR receiver.

Blogs

  • BBC R&D - BBC Research and Development. Checkout the weekly notes.
  • 3D CineCast - A curation about new media technologies.
  • Canal+ - CANAL+ Open Source Community.
  • Youtube Engineering and Developers Blog - What's happening with engineering and developers at YouTube.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 27, 2019
entry.content:
Monitoring & Quality Control

  • JACK Meterbridge - A collection of graphical Audio meters for JACK (ballistics may be incorrect).

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 16, 2019
entry.content:
Companion Screens

  • dvbcss-synckit-ios (⭐11) - iOS libraries for companion screen applications that are synchronised frame-accurately to a TV.
  • pydvbcss (⭐30) - Implementation of the DVB Companion Screens and Streams protocols for synchronised media playback.

Connected TVs

  • HbbPlayer (⭐61) - An HbbTV and W3C specifications compliant application that can playback media from a URL.

Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Blender - 3D creation suite supporting 3D modelling, animation, motion tracking, video editing, and more.

Media Players

  • rx-player (⭐898) - HTML5/Javascript video player that supports MPEG-DASH and SmoothStreaming.

Monitoring & Quality Control

  • LTC-tools (⭐80) - A collection of tools to handle Linear Timecode (LTC) and convert to MIDI Timecode (MTC).

Multimedia content processing

  • AvTranscoder (⭐165) - FFmpeg/LibAV-based high-level API to re-wrap or transcode media, with bindings for Java and Python.
  • FFmpeg - A cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video. Supports SMPTE ST 2110.
  • VideoContext (⭐1.3k) - Experimental HTML5/WebGL library for creating interactive and responsive web videos.
  • Voctomix (⭐605) - Customizable conference recording/mixing/streaming software based on Python and GStreamer.

Network & Storage Testing

  • SMPTE 2110-20 Analyzer (⭐79) - Analyzer to inspect network packets generated in accordance with SMPTE ST 2110.

Software-defined radio

  • ODR-mmbTools - Fork of CRC-mmbTools. Adds live, DAB+, associated data, distributed infrastructure, SFN.

Subtitling

  • EBU-TT-D Subtitling within dash.js (⭐11) - dash.js fork with EBU-TT-D subtitles in HTML/CSS overlay. Later added to dash.js (⭐11).
  • EBU-TT Live Interoperability Toolkit (⭐25) - Components for generating, testing and distributing EBU-TT Live subtitles.
  • GStreamer TTML subtitling package (⭐19) - A means for GStreamer pipelines to parse and render EBU-TT-D (TTML) subtitles.
  • IRT EBU-TT-D Application Samples (⭐13) - EBU-TT-D sample files, PNG images and mp4 videos as rendering references.
  • Subtitling Conversion Framework (SCF) (⭐58) - Modules for converting subtitle formats, incl. EBU STL and EBU-TT files.
  • Timed Text Toolkit (ttt) (⭐78) - Tools that support/use the W3C Timed Text Markup Language (TTML).

Video Production

  • Open Lighting Architecture (OLA) - Travel adaptor for the lighting industry, for interconnecting DMX-512, IP and USB.
  • Q Light Controller+ (QLC+) - Cross-platform control of DMX or analogue lighting systems (heads, dimmers, etc.).

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 14, 2019
entry.content:
Documentation

  • Kronekeeper (⭐14) - A web based application for recording and managing Krone frame records.

Subtitling

  • Subtitle Edit - An editor for subtitles.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 21, 2019
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • KFR - Fast, modern C++ DSP framework, DFT/FFT, Audio resampling, FIR/IIR, Biquad, EBU R 128.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 11, 2019
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Sofie - TV Automation (⭐395) - MOS-driven automation system for news casts, with many libraries for e.g. device control.

Monitoring & Quality Control

  • Pi Audio Monitor (⭐163) - Audio Monitoring for Raspberry Pi, supports S/PDIF, AES3, AES67, Livewire and Ravenna.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 10, 2019
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • FFmbc (⭐197) - FFmpeg customized for broadcast and professional usage.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 27, 2019
entry.content:
Metadata

  • libadm (⭐42) - Audio Definition Model (ITU-R BS.2076) handling C++11 library.

Multimedia content processing

  • libbw64 (⭐34) – Header-only Broadcast Wave 64 (ITU-R BS.2088) C++11 library.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 07, 2019
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • Beam Coder (⭐409) - Node.js native bindings to FFmpeg, with support for asynchronous processing via promises and streams.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jul 30, 2018
entry.content:
Video Production

  • MOS-connection (⭐23) - A JavaScript library for connection and MOS messaging either as MOS device or NRCS.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 18, 2018
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • EBU ADM Renderer (⭐87) - Reference implementation of the EBU ADM Renderer (EBU Tech 3388)

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 01, 2018
entry.content:
Radio Production

  • OpenBroadcaster Open Source LPFM IPTV Broadcast Automation. Server and Player code here.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 26, 2018
entry.content:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Open Playout Automation (⭐192) - A CasparCG-based MCR play-out system.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 20, 2018
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • rtmp (⭐139) - Server implementation of Adobe's RTMP 1.0 protocol in Go.

Blogs

  • BBC News Labs - Open Source projects from BBC News Labs.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 09, 2018
entry.content:
Radio Production

  • RAAR (⭐20) - A ruby application to manage and browse an audio archive.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jan 31, 2018
entry.content:
DVB & WiFi

  • TSDuck - Extensible toolkit for MPEG/DVB transport streams testing, monitoring, integration, debugging, and more.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jan 19, 2018
entry.content:
Monitoring & Quality Control

  • SilentJack (⭐23) - Dead-air / Silence detector for JACK.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Nov 08, 2017
entry.content:
Media Players

  • VLC - Simple, fast and powerful media player.

Multimedia content processing

  • Kelvinadon (⭐18) - Node.JS pure Javascript module for streaming MXF files to and from JSON.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Sep 08, 2017
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • Dynamorse (⭐47) - IT swiss army knife - a Node-RED media pipeline builder, adding professional media processing nodes.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jul 06, 2017
entry.content:
Monitoring & Quality Control

  • Jack Meter (⭐46) - Text console based DPM (Digital Peak Meter) for JACK.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 30, 2017
entry.content:
Codecs

  • opencore-amr - Audio codecs extracted from Android Open Source Project, including AAC.

Monitoring & Quality Control

  • BeaqleJS (⭐88) - A framework to create browser based listening tests for subjective audio quality assessment.
  • MediaInfo - A convenient unified display of the most relevant technical and tag data for video and audio files.
  • Photon (⭐242) - Implementation of the SMPTE Interoperable Master Format (IMF) standard.
  • QCTools (⭐336) - Quality Control tools for video preservation to analyse digitized video files.
  • Rotter (⭐54) - Recording of Transmissions / Audio Logger for JACK.
  • silan (⭐38) - Audiofile silence analyzer.
  • VMAF (⭐5k) - Perceptual video quality assessment based on multi-method fusion.
  • Wisual (⭐22) - A web service for Visual Quality Assessment, which supports PSNR, SSIM, VQM, etc.

Radio Production

  • Ardour - A digital audio workstation.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 23, 2017
entry.content:
Media Players

  • IDJC - A GTK+ Shoutcast/Icecast client with two main media players.
  • MPD - A flexible, powerful, server-side application for playing music.
  • mpg123 - A fast console MPEG Audio Player and decoder library.
  • Mixxx - A free, open source DJ software.

Multimedia content processing

  • rgain - Tools and Python library to read, write and calculate Replay Gain.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 16, 2017
entry.content:
Codecs

  • FLAC - Free Lossless Audio Coding, used by some broadcasters for audio exchange, storage.
  • Turing Codec - An H.265/HEVC open source software encoder designed for fast and efficient video compression.

Companion Screens

  • dial-discovery-ios (⭐3) - A library for the discovery of devices via the DIAL protocol on the iOS platform.
  • dvbcss-synctiming (⭐22) - A system for measuring how accurately a TV or companion are synchronised.

DVB & WiFi

  • DVB Inspector - An open-source DVB analyzer.
  • DVBlast - A simple and powerful MPEG-2/TS demux and streaming application.
  • dvbshout (⭐10) - Tool to send DVB audio to a shoutcast server or a RTP stream.
  • Opencaster - A free and open source MPEG2 transport stream data generator and packet manipulator.

Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Aurena (⭐130) - A network distributed media playback system.
  • CasparCG - A professional graphics and video play-out software, proven in 24/7 broadcasts since 2006.

Hybrid Radio

  • RadioVIS Html Player (⭐14) - RadioVIS Player using WebSocket.

Metadata

  • EBUCore (⭐23) - The Github for maintenance of the EBUCore schema.
  • TV-Anytime (⭐16) - The TV-Anytime schema github maintenance page.

Multimedia content processing

  • UPipe (⭐1) - Primarily designed to be the core of a multimedia player, transcoder or streamer.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 05, 2017
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • SoX - The Swiss Army knife of sound processing programs.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 28, 2017
entry.content:
Software-defined radio

  • GNU Radio - A software development toolkit that provides signal processing blocks to implement software radios.
  • welle.io - An open source DAB and DAB+ software defined radio (SDR) with support for airspy and rtlsdr.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 27, 2017
entry.content:
Connected TVs

  • TAL - The TV Application Layer (TAL) is an open source library for building applications for Connected TV devices.

DVB & WiFi

  • ts2mpa (⭐5) - Simple tool to extract MPEG Audio from a MPEG Transport Stream (TS).

Hybrid Radio

  • RadioDNS for Node.js (⭐6) - Perform RadioDNS resolutions and service lookups in node.js.
  • RadioVIS Stomp Server (⭐12) - RadioVIS STOMP server written in node.js.

Network & Storage Testing

  • Fio (⭐5.7k) - Flexible I/O Tester
  • iPerf3 - The TCP, UDP and SCTP network bandwidth measurement tool.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 23, 2017
entry.content:
Hybrid Radio

  • RadioVIS Demo (⭐28) - RadioVIS client application in Python.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 18, 2017
entry.content:
DVB & WiFi

  • Project X - DVB demux tool.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 27, 2017
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • Flowblade (⭐2.9k) - A multitrack non-linear video editor.
  • Snowmix - Live Video Mixer.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Mar 24, 2017
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • Codem-isoboxer (⭐118) A small browser-based MPEG-4 (ISOBMFF) parser.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Dec 12, 2016
entry.content:
Subtitling

  • imscJS (⭐87) - JavaScript library for rendering IMSC1 Text and Image Profile documents to HTML5.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Aug 05, 2016
entry.content:
Hybrid Radio

  • RadioTag.js (⭐5) - RadioTag client library in JavaScript.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 21, 2016
entry.content:
Metadata

  • MAJ API (⭐18) - Pure Java library for reading and writing MXF and AAF files.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 16, 2016
entry.content:
Subtitling

  • EBU-TT-D W3C XML Schema (⭐9) - Informative EBU-TT-D XML Schema to support the implementation of EBU Tech 3380.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 23, 2016
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • Bento4 (⭐2.2k) - Full-featured MP4 format and MPEG DASH C++ class library and tools.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on May 11, 2016
entry.content:
Blogs

  • The Netflix Tech Blog - A Netflix blog focused on technology and technology issues.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 21, 2016
entry.content:
Subtitling

  • CCExtractor - A tool that analyzes video files and produces stand-alone subtitle files.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 14, 2016
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • Loudness Validator (⭐14) - A set of applications to analyse, visualise and correct the loudness.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Feb 23, 2016
entry.content:
DVB & WiFi

  • DTT 2 IP (⭐27) - Broadcast to IP conversion for Wifi indoor coverage.
  • WiFiBroadcast - Analog-like transmission of live video data.

Media Players

  • Kodi (⭐20k) - A software media player and entertainment hub for digital media.

Multimedia content processing

  • GStreamer - A library for constructing graphs of media-handling components.
  • MP4Box.js (⭐2.2k) - JavaScript library to process MP4 files in the browser (and in NodeJS).

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Jun 11, 2015
entry.content:
Distributed Media Processing

  • StormCV (⭐170) - Apache Storm + OpenCV = large scale distributed image and video analysis.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Apr 22, 2015
entry.content:
Multimedia content processing

  • L-SMASH (⭐238) - A rigidly spec-compliant ISOBMFF library, which has full DASH muxing support.

entry.title: Awesome Broadcasting Updates on Sep 27, 2014
entry.content:
Media Players

  • Dash.js (⭐11) - A reference client implementation for the playback of MPEG DASH via Javascript and compliant browsers.

Multimedia content processing

  • LibAV - Open source audio and video processing tools.
  • Open Broadcast Encoder - Broadcast encoder built from Open Source components.
